bug.short_desc: Manual section about selection should discuss the difference with Virtual widgets

long_desc.thetext:
In the documentation about "Selection Handling" [1], the manual discusses widgets which allow for selection. It specifically names the widgets which have selection interfaces, however it completely leaves out the "Virtual" widgets qx.ui.list.List, qx.ui.form.VirtualSelectBox, qx.ui.form.VirtualComboBox. These widgets have a selection interface which is inconsistent with the other selection widgets, namely the "changeSelection" event never fires (since the underlying qx.data.Array never changes) and there are some subtleties involved.
I think it might be a good place to discuss these differences since after reading this page in the manual it might be assumed that all selection widgets share the same selection interface, even if the Virtual (or data-aware) selection widgets where not named at the beginning of the article.
Cheerrs, Omri
[1] http://manual.qooxdoo.org/current/pages/desktop/ui_selection.html
